name: Tome Supreme
description:
Tome Supreme is a fast paced twin stick shooter with magic and chaos.
Inspired by other famous rogue like games, with radioactive thrones and little boys with mommy issues. Use chaotic magic attacks to fight the aberrations that stole the Tome Supreme, the book with the laws of magic.

Fight your way throught hordes of enemies on 7 different levels, with many different spells and 5 boss battles.
